func.title: SplitRGBaValue

param.name: red
param.desc: [opt] variable in which the red value is to be stored

param.name: green
param.desc: [opt] variable in which the green value is to be stored

param.name: blue
param.desc: [opt] variable in which the blue value is to be stored

param.name: alpha
param.desc: [opt] variable in which the alpha value is to be stored

func.desc: Writes the red, green, blue, and alpha values of a 32 bit color value to the specified variables.

example.text: Displays the three color values of the currently selected clonk above the clonk's head.
